articles.title: ChatGPT is bringing back 4o as an option because people missed it
articles.description: OpenAI is bringing back GPT-4o in ChatGPT just one day after replacing it with GPT-5. In a post on X, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman confirmed that the company will let paid users switch to GPT-4o after ChatGPT users mourned its replacement. “We will let Plus users choose to continue to use 4o,” Altman says. “We […]
articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.content: OpenAI is bringing back GPT-4o in ChatGPT just one day after replacing it with GPT-5. articles.title: GPT OSS models from OpenAI are now available on SageMaker JumpStart
articles.description: Today, we are excited to announce the availability of Open AI’s new open weight GPT OSS models, gpt-oss-120b and gpt-oss-20b, from OpenAI in Amazon SageMaker JumpStart. With this launch, you can now deploy OpenAI’s newest reasoning models to build, experiment, and responsibly scale your generative AI ideas on AWS. In this post, we demonstrate how to get started with these models on SageMaker JumpStart.
articles.author: Niithiyn Vijeaswaran
articles.content: Today, we are excited to announce the availability of Open AI’s new open weight GPT OSS models, gpt-oss-120b and gpt-oss-20b, from OpenAI in Amazon SageMaker JumpStart. With this launch, you can now deploy OpenAI’s newest reasoning models to build, experiment, and responsibly scale your generative AI ideas on AWS. In this post, we demonstrate how to get started with these models on SageMaker JumpStart.

articles.title: No Backdoors. No Kill Switches. No Spyware.
articles.description: NVIDIA GPUs are at the heart of modern computing. They’re used across industries — from healthcare and finance to scientific research, autonomous systems and AI infrastructure. NVIDIA GPUs are embedded into CT scanners and MRI machines, DNA sequencers, air-traffic radar tracking systems, city traffic-management systems, self-driving cars, supercomputers, TV broadcasting systems, casino machines and game Read Article

articles.title: Pioneering AI workflows at scale: A deep dive into Asana AI Studio and Amazon Q index collaboration
articles.description: Today, we’re excited to announce the integration of Asana AI Studio with Amazon Q index, bringing generative AI directly into your daily workflows. In this post, we explore how Asana AI Studio and Amazon Q index transform enterprise efficiency through intelligent workflow automation and enhanced data accessibility.

articles.title: Black Hat 2025 shows agentic AI moving from theory to practice
articles.description: At Black Hat 2025, agentic artificial intelligence is demonstrating tangible value within cybersecurity, marking a significant evolution from its largely theoretical presence at Black Hat 2024. This advancement represents a shift towards proactive, autonomous systems that can independently investigate, respond to, and predict potential cyberattacks. This transformation fundamentally alters security operations. Dr. Anya Sharma, Chief […]

articles.title: Cleo launches new ‘AI money coach’ to help fix your spending habits
articles.description: UK-based fintech Cleo, known for its AI-powered budgeting app, has launched its most advanced product to date. Dubbed Cleo 3.0, the new version introduces features such as voice interaction, long-term memory, and improved reasoning capabilities. Barney Hussey-Yeo, Cleo’s founder and chief executive, said Cleo 3.0 is less chatbot and more “conversational AI money coach.” Users can now have real-time voice conversations with Cleo, which the company says makes financial help feel more natural and...
articles.author: Siôn Geschwindt
articles.content: UK-based fintech Cleo, known for its AI-powered budgeting app, has launched its most advanced product to date. articles.title: Expose hidden threats with EASE
articles.description: Today, we’re excited to introduce the Elastic AI SOC Engine (EASE), an easy-to-deploy package of AI capabilities that cuts investigation time and helps security operations center (SOC) analysts detect complex, hidden threats faster. Designed for fast adoption, EASE offers a low-friction path to bring AI into your existing security workflows. It’s especially valuable for organizations that can’t yet migrate to a next-gen security information and event management (SIEM) like Elastic Security but...
articles.author: Manasa Agaram,James Spiteri
articles.content: Today, we’re excited to introduce the Elastic AI SOC Engine (EASE), an easy-to-deploy package of AI capabilities that cuts investigation time and helps security operations center (SOC) analysts detect complex, hidden threats faster. articles.title: The End of Limitless Compute: AI’s Physical Reality
articles.description: For developers, compute has long been an abstraction—a limitless resource summoned with an API call. That illusion is now shattering against hard physical realities. The voracious appetite of AI means the success of your next application may depend less on the elegance of your algorithm and more on your cloud provider’s ability to navigate aContinue reading "The End of Limitless Compute: AI’s Physical Reality" The post The End of Limitless Compute: AI’s Physical Reality appeared first on...

articles.title: New Report: The Architectural Patterns of Financial AI
articles.description: At Bankwell Bank, a new employee named Sarah works around the clock. She responds to loan applicants via email and SMS in under three minutes, gathers missing documents, and hands a perfectly structured file to her human colleagues. She has re-activated roughly half of the bank’s otherwise lost applicants and saved loan officers 90% ofContinue reading "New Report: The Architectural Patterns of Financial AI" The post New Report: The Architectural Patterns of Financial AI appeared first on...
